meanings.definition: Relating to or affected by inflammation of the renal pelvis (pyelitis).
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed antibiotics for the pyelitic infection.
meanings.sent2: The pyelitic condition caused discomfort in the kidney area.
meanings.sent3: The pyelitic kidney was not in the mood for any more inflammation.
meanings.sent4: Her kidney felt like a pyelitic volcano ready to erupt.
meanings.sent5: The pyelitic inflammation turned the kidney into a fiery furnace.
